question:
The Consumer Disputes Redressal Commissions (CDRCs) at the national, state and district levels will entertain complaints related to which of the following?
1. Overcharging or deceptive charging
2. Unfair or restrictive trade practices
3. Sale of hazardous goods and services which may be hazardous to life
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Consumer Disputes Redressal Commissions (CDRCs) at the national, state and district levels will entertain complaints related to the following: (1) Overcharging or deceptive charging, (2) Unfair or restrictive trade practices, (4) Sale of hazardous goods and services which may be hazardous to life and (4) Sale of defective goods or services.
